item.title: 2 water buffaloes kill farmer after he becomes trapped in their enclosure
item.description: A farmer in Oklahoma has been killed by two water buffaloes after becoming trapped inside their enclosure, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Hikers confront man accused of starting fire on Los Angeles trail
item.description: A group of hikers stepped in to help stop an alleged arsonist accused of starting a fire in LA's popular Runyon Canyon.

item.title: Map shows more than 1,300 measles cases across U.S.
item.description: CBS News is tracking a outbreak of measles in West Texas that has led to the deaths of two children and a growing number of cases around the country.

item.title: Skeleton of medieval knight found under former ice cream parlor
item.description: The site where the remains were found was once home to a beloved ice cream shop.
